title: Banned for third party??? I didnt even do anything helppp
body: (not my picture btw idk how to insert snips as a link) Its been a year since I haven't played league, so I missed playing the game with my friends. So naturally, I redownloaded it and enter the correct information to login. But once I clicked login it said I was banned. This happened to me on another game for the same reason but I sent out a report and eventually got unbanned. Can someone tell me what's going on or does it mean my account got disabled for not playing for a long time? :'(

replies.body: There's nothing much we can do from the boards. Contact Riot via a [Support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com) or message them on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).
Send a support ticket requesting further investigation if you suspect your account may have been stolen and used by someone else. I have seen bans for hacks reverted after investigation.

Not the case sadly, I had the same thing happen to me, they tell you that if you get banned for 3rd party there is nothing they can do. Trust me I lost a very expensive account because of it. Not my happiest time, and now I refuse to buy skins D:
